text: Not all those who wander are lost.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

text: A famous explorer once said, that the extraordinary is in what we do, not who we are.
author: Lara Croft

text: You underestimate the power of the Dark Side.
author: Darth Vader

text: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
author: Albus Dumbledore

text: Only love can truly save the world.
author: Wonder Woman

text: The needs of the many outweigh the needs of the few.
author: Spock

text: The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword.
author: Ned Stark

text: Do or do not, there is no try.
author: Yoda

text: Do or do not. There is no try.
author: Genheylou
